name: danfoss-solar
readme: This can handle the log files from Danfoss TLX Pro Portal-Upload. It displays the data on the browser and serves it as SunnyBeam CSV which in turn can be used by sunwatcherapp.sineta.de
description: This can handle the log files from Danfoss TLX Pro Portal-Upload. It displays the data on the browser and serves it as SunnyBeam CSV which in turn can be used by sunwatcherapp.sineta.de
